name: SunHumidifier
0:
”Alexa, open sun humidifier.”
”turn on humidifier”
”adjust humidifier to medium mist”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sun humidifier
des:
With the " Sun Humidifier” action and Google, you can interact with your smart humidifiers by voice. 
If you want to add the humidifier to the smart home, please use SunHome action.
You can link both action to the Alexa app if needed.

Before using, Please make sure your device is connected to the SunHome app, and you name.
To get started, select the 'ENABLE TO USE' button in the Alexa App to link your SunHome account.

You can activate your skills by saying: "open sun humidifier."
Alexa will reply to the name of available humidifiers under your account.
You can control the device through the following commands:
"turn on <name of humidifier>"
"adjust <name of humidifier> to medium mist"
"adjust <name of humidifier> to sleep mode"

You may also use just one command to control the humidifier:
" Alexa, Tell sun humidifier and to adjust <name of humidifier> to nightlight mode"
" Alexa, Talk to sun humidifier and set <name of humidifier> to low mist"
